QUERY.TITLE: World Heritage Sites
QUERY.DESC: Give the names and / or location of places that have been designated as UNESCO World Heritage Sites of outstanding beauty or importance .
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents must mention the name and / or geographical location of monuments , cities or places that have been officially designated by UNESCO as World Heritage sites of outstanding beauty or importance . Discussions on potential or candidate sites are not relevant . It must be clear from the document that the official UNESCO status is involved .
